Variable.doc: List of directories to watch for changes, defaults to hs.configdir
stripped_doc: List of directories to watch for changes, defaults to hs.configdir
Variable.name: watch_paths
Variable.desc: List of directories to watch for changes, defaults to hs.configdir

desc: Adds a hotkey to reload the hammerspoon configuration, and a pathwatcher to automatically reload on changes.
doc:
Adds a hotkey to reload the hammerspoon configuration, and a pathwatcher to automatically reload on changes.

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/ReloadConfiguration.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/ReloadConfiguration.spoon.zip)

items.doc: List of directories to watch for changes, defaults to hs.configdir
stripped_doc: List of directories to watch for changes, defaults to hs.configdir
items.name: watch_paths
items.desc: List of directories to watch for changes, defaults to hs.configdir

items.doc:
Binds hotkeys for ReloadConfiguration

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  * reloadConfiguration - This will cause the configuration to be reloaded
items.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* reloadConfiguration - This will cause the configuration to be reloaded
